
# The Processing Toolbox {#tutorial-processing}

## Purpose

* Learn how to use the _Processing Toolbox_ to maniuplate vector and raster data.

## Tutorial

* Open Minas Passage Raster, coastlines vector, profile vector
* Create profile using the SAGA profile tool
* Style Layers, use _Print Composer_ to export
* Optional exercise: contour Long Lake data using RST
